verses.text: “\w My|strong="H3117"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* consumed. \w My|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w extinct|strong="H2193"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* ready \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H6913"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w also|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w dim|strong="H3543"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* reason \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3708"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w members|strong="H3338"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w come|strong="H4672"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5674"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w past|strong="H5674"\w*. \w My|strong="H5674"\w* \w plans|strong="H2154"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w broken|strong="H5423"\w* \w off|strong="H5423"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H4180"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H5674"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w change|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w into|strong="H3915"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, saying ‘\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w light|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*’ \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

where then \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w my|strong="H7789"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*? As \w for|strong="H4310"\w* \w my|strong="H7789"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w see|strong="H7789"\w* it?
